ScreenText.ModFileGenerated: LMPModControl.xml file generated in your KSP folder
ScreenText.Spectating: This vessel is being controlled by
ScreenText.SafetyBubble: Remember!! While you're inside the safety bubble you won't be seen by other players!!
ScreenText.CheckParts: If you use mod or DLC parts that other players don't have you won't be seen by them!
ScreenText.CannotRecover: Cannot recover vessel, the vessel is not yours.
ScreenText.CannotTerminate: Cannot terminate vessel, the vessel is not yours.
ScreenText.SpectatingRemoved: The vessel you were spectating was removed
ScreenText.WarpDisabled: Cannot warp, warping is disabled on this server
ScreenText.WaitingSubspace: Cannot warp, waiting subspace id from the server
ScreenText.ScreenshotInterval: Interval between screenshots is $1 seconds. Cannot upload the screenshot at this moment
ScreenText.CraftLibraryInterval: Interval between craft library requests is $1 seconds. Cannot process the request at this moment
ScreenText.IncreasedInterpolationOffset: Warning! Your interpolation offset has been increased as it was too low for this server
ScreenText.SackingKerbalsNotAllowed: This server does not allow firing kerbals
ScreenText.CannotLoadGames: LMP does not allow loading savegames
ScreenText.KerbalNotYours: Another player is using this kerbal
ScreenText.UnsafeToSync: Cannot sync while in unstable orbit or spectating as you might crash! You can turn off this check in settings
